ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
What is your overall rating of the primary instructor?
The primary instructor's sensitivity to students and ability to provide students with adequate feedback was:

narratives.question_text: Indicate the total number of hours per week (outside the classroom) you spent on this course:
Looking back on this course, what is your overall assessment of the course:  What are its strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might it be improved?
comments: I think this is a great opportunity to hear about my fellow doctoral students' work in a good environment. I would like us to continue this forum next semester, based on what I have seen so far.

A very occasional seminar... Strength: relevance and schedule (as intended not as carried out) Weakness: Follow-up "assignments" not included post/between meetings Recommendation; Consistent schedule; greater frequency

narratives.question_text: Please evaluate the instructor of this course. What are the instructor's strengths and weaknesses, and in what ways might his or her teaching be improved?
comments: Instructor: Christian Tschudi  Very kind and approachable instructor!
Instructor: Christian Tschudi  Very knowledgeable, accommodating, intelligent, capable and encouraging. Willing to engage and support.

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize this course for a fellow student? Would you recommend it to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Very low demand, useful and informative sessions for PhD students seeking navigation/consult/reminders.
